AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing StreamHostCheck, which sets the bot's stream status to whatever channel the configured user is hosting.
[p]channelset to set the channel to check. No additional requirements. Make sure to set the twitch token with [p]streamset twitchtoken before use
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: StreamHostCheck
DESCRIPTION: Checks the specified channel for what channel that channel is hosting and sets the bot's status based on that
